name: Monster Storm：Idle games
description:
Join the adventure and discover the amazing Monster World!
Have you got what it takes to become a Monster Trainer? See if you can lead these magical monsters to victory as they battle one another in this game.

Whether you’re sleeping, eating, or taking the subway - come play Monster Storm! Monster Storm is an idle game, which brings to life the excitement and adventures of the monster word in a fun and social way!
